ฺูุฏ Constructor (Overloading)

ฺฉ Class ูโุชูุงูุฏ ฺูุฏ Constructor ุฏุงุดุชู ุจุงุดุฏ: 


class User
{
    public string Username;
    public int Level;

    public User()
    {
        Username = "Guest";
        Level = 1;
    }

    public User(string username)
    {
        Username = username;
        Level = 1;
    }

    public User(string username, int level)
    {
        Username = username;
        Level = level;
    }
}
